EditTextPreference.android:title: URI of a server
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This parameter defines an uri to get an archive of slides

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show slide instead of slideset
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This parameter manage an action on click icon in search: if true a click calls a specific slide otherwise a slideset is shown

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Don't show next/prev buttons
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This flag insist on hiding buttons in slide view to use gestures instead

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use vertical flick
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Flick up in slide encourages opening of the index, flick down - returning to the search

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Auto enter
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enter when slide have been downloaded

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Scale the whole slideshow
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Whole slide show will be scaled rather than a slide only

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Save aspect ratio
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Picture is scaled with constant aspect ratio

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Smoth animation
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: An animation speed is implied from speed of a gesture that caused it.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Interval in slideshow
EditTextPreference.android:summary: A slideshow will slides in this period
